nl.inl.blacklab.search.Searcher

  • Packages that use Searcher 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.index
    Classes related to indexing.
    nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument
    Classes for dealing with per-document resultsets (instead of per-hits resultsets, which BlackLab mostly deals with)
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.contextql  
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.fimatch  
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping
    Classes for grouping hits.
    nl.inl.blacklab.tools
    Package for tool applications.
